content.question: Which of the following best describes the role of phospholipids?

choices.label: Phospholipids provide structural stability to animal cell membranes.
Phospholipids support physiological functions, including growth.
Phospholipids provide energy storage and support cell function.
Phospholipids form the lipid bilayer found in cell membranes.

content.answer: Phospholipids form the lipid bilayer found in cell membranes.
